name: Sambhawana
briefDescription: Sambhawana is a non-profit organization established by a group of development professionals in 2005 and is registered under Societies Registration Act 1860. Our approach to development is firmly founded upon participatory action at the community level. At the heart of the organization is the aim of developing sustainable livelihood, which is facilitated by an intensive participatory process of natural resource development and local institutional development. Particular emphasis is placed upon the poor and women.
